sentences.en: ANOLE Designing Company is characterized with international design concept and practical operation.
sentences.cn: 巨蜥设计以国际化的设计观念和实务运作树立在设计行业之中.

sentences.en: Blind anole still has the ability to change color to adapt to surrounding environment.
sentences.cn: 瞎眼的变色龙,还是有能力变色来适应周遭环境的.

sentences.en: So this dissertation proposes a general development model in B2C e-business, which is named "anole".
sentences.cn: 为此，本论文提出了一种B2C电子商务系统通用开发模型，取名叫“变色龙”。

sentences.en: The eyes of anole can be versatile.
sentences.cn: 变色龙的眼睛可以转动.

sentences.en: The length of a anole tongue is two times longer than its body.
sentences.cn: 变色龙舌头的长度是它自己身体的两倍.

trans.tran_en: any small arboreal tropical American insectivorous lizards of the genus Anolis, such as A. carolinensis (green anole): family Iguanidae (iguanas). They are able to change the colour of their skin
